# PageTagSet.ToString method

Get the tag set as comma separated list.

```csharp
public string ToString(string separator = ",")
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| separator | Optional separator string to separate the individual tags with. Defaults to comma ','. |

## Return Value

List of tags.
